I have followed the steps in Xindice Wiki which relocating the document storage
from Tomcat webapps Xindice folder to a specific folder. However, I still got my
documents imported loss after Tomcat restart.

The document configuration is like

db/hkliss/data/collection1
db/hkliss/data/collection2
db/hkliss/data/collection3

After Tomcat restarts, only db/hkliss is remained with all child collections
disappeared.
